title: Mini-Ep 210: The Inner Work
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 210: The Inner Work
itunes:subtitle: Kate and Doree dig into religion and spiritualism, then hear from listeners about the joy of being lazy and unlearning the cultural value of productivity, how to save your voice, and some frugal butt care tips. Word of the Week: Tr...
description:
Kate and Doree dig into religion and spiritualism, then hear from listeners about the joy of being lazy and unlearning the cultural value of productivity, how to save your voice, and some frugal butt care tips. 


Word of the Week: Try using “fortnightly” in a sentence if you do not regularly use it.


For info on the Thanks for Waiting Virtual Launch Party, click here!


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.
  • Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter
